001package imagingbook.lib.filter.examples;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.filter.GenericFilterVector;
004import imagingbook.lib.image.data.PixelPack;
005
006public class ExampleFilterVector extends GenericFilterVector {
007
008        public ExampleFilterVector() {
009        }
010
011        int width = 3;
012        int height = 3;
013        int xc = 1;
014        int yc = 1;
015        
016        static float[][] H = {
017                        {1, 2, 1},
018                        {2, 4, 2},
019                        {1, 2, 1}};
020        
021        @Override
022        protected float[] doPixel(PixelPack pack, int u, int v) {
023                int depth = pack.getDepth();
024                float[] sum = new float[depth];
025                for (int j = 0; j < height; j++) {
026                        int vj = v + j - yc;
027                        for (int i = 0; i < width; i++) {
028                                int ui = u + i - xc;
029                                float[] p = pack.getVec(ui, vj);
030                                for (int k = 0; k < depth; k++) {
031                                        sum[k] = sum[k] + (p[k] * H[i][j]) / 16;
032                                }
033                        }
034                }
035                return sum;
036        }
037
038}
